sneakers.name: Air Jordan Mid Iridescent ReflectiveWhite
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid collection is growing! The brand in the Jumpman offers us a new declination intended for women, in a colour that at first glance seems rather sober but which is much more worked once its reflective elements are visible.

sneakers.name: Air Force 1 '07 Barely Grape
sneakers.description: Nike's most iconic silhouette makes a comeback in a pale colourMauve, ideal for the upcoming summer season. Designed by Bruce Kilgore in 1982, this is the first pair with Nike AIR technology, which was originally intended for basketball.

sneakers.name: Air Max97 Black
sneakers.description: Nike unveils a new iteration of one of its flagship models: the Nike Air Max 97A pair with multiple inspirations, especially water represented by the characteristic lines of the model.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Low Gym Red White
sneakers.description: The brand in the Jumpman imagined a Low version of its flagship model based on the very first Air Jordan 1 HighOG, released in 1985 The Air Jordan 1 Low GyRed Whitem features a leather base with red overlays covering the forefoot, collar and heel. The toebox and quarter panel are presented in white and match the laces and tongue. A tone-on-tone embroidered Wings logo is placed on the heel, a red Jumpman motif on the white nylon tongue, while the emblematic number "23" covers the central laces loop. The Air Jordan 1 Lowversions, as well as the High and Mid The designs inspired by the brand's past are no longer counted, much to the delight of Jumpman fans!

sneakers.name: Oversized Red
sneakers.description: Sizing: fits largetake a size smaller than your usual height. Alexander McQueen has over time become a pillar of the global luxury industry, reinventing flagship silhouettes with oversized soles. The House then relaunched the trend and became the leader in this field, with creations such as the Oversized Red. The Alexander McQueen Oversized Redis dressed in a white leather suit with a red suede insert at the heel with the gold inscription "Alexander McQueen". The oversized rubber sole, which fits the silhouette of the model, is completely dressed in white. The design is completed by the straight lacing thanks to the white flat laces. This model, which has become a must-have, continues to see its collection grow in a variety of colours. Among them, the Oversized Ivory Black or the Oversized Blue Worker !

sneakers.name: Air Force 1 Sketch Blue Swoosh
sneakers.description: Nike unveils new iterations of Air Force 1 as a continuation of the "Air Force 1" package.Sketch", having in common a Swoosh that seems to be quickly drawn as if it were a sketch. The Nike Air Force 1 Sketch Blue Swoosh has a completely white base with the exception of the Swoosh which opts for a blue tint. Small annotations detail certain elements and small diagrams represent the air bubble that can be found on the Air Max. With this edition of Air Force 1, Nike expands the Sketch Pack, also including Blazer Mid and Air Max 1. A pleasure for the sneaker community!

sneakers.name: Yung-1 Legend Ivy Hi Res Yellow
sneakers.description: The German equipment manufacturer is revisiting the Falcon Dorf, a model originally released in the 1990s, in a more modern version while retaining its retro look with the Yung-1. The Adidas Yung-1 Legend Ivy Hi Res Yellowfeatures a suede and neoprene stem mixing different shades of grey with purple inserts. There are also touches of green on the three stripes, the tongue and the outsole. Finally, the unmistakable Adidas logo on the tongue and a chunky sole with Torsion technology complete the silhouette design. With a silhouette surfing on the dadshoe trend, this pair is a nod to vintage running models, and a very nice colorful iteration, matching perfectly with summer looks!
